Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to including the basis of religious attire and facial hair in the definition of unlawful discriminatory practice
Summary: Relates to including the basis of religious attire and facial hair in the definition of unlawful discriminatory practice.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to including the basis of religious attire and facial hair in the definition of unlawful discriminatory practice
